alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 2:14PM PDT until March 25 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches with higher amounts at the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...From now this morning to 5 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions across the Blue Mountain passes, especially at night and early in the morning during this multi-day event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
